mapper.sql: regOptId, operRoomId, operRoomName, instrnurseId1, circunurseId1, anesthetistId, circuAnesthetistId, perfusionDoctorId, startTime, instrnurseId2, circunurseId2, isHold, healthNurse, optBody, operRegDate, pcs, beid
mapper.select: select operRoomId from bas_dispatch where regOptId = #{regOptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into bas_dispatch (regOptId, operRoomId, operRoomName, instrnurseId1, circunurseId1, anesthetistId, circuAnesthetistId, perfusionDoctorId, startTime, instrnurseId2, circunurseId2, isHold, healthNurse, optBody, operRegDate, pcs, beid ) values (#{regOptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operRoomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operRoomName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{instrnurseId1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{circunurseId1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{anesthetistId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{circuAnesthetistId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{perfusionDoctorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{instrnurseId2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{circunurseId2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isHold,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{healthNurse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{optBody,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operRegDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pcs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into bas_dispatch
regOptId,
operRoomId,
operRoomName,
instrnurseId1,
circunurseId1,
anesthetistId,
circuAnesthetistId,
perfusionDoctorId,
startTime,
instrnurseId2,
circunurseId2,
isHold,
healthNurse,
optBody,
operRegDate,
pcs,
beid,
#{regOptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{operRoomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{operRoomName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{instrnurseId1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{circunurseId1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{anesthetistId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{circuAnesthetistId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{perfusionDoctorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{instrnurseId2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{circunurseId2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{isHold,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{healthNurse,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{optBody,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{operRegDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pcs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update bas_dispatch
operRoomId = #{operRoomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operRoomName = #{operRoomName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
instrnurseId1 = #{instrnurseId1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
circunurseId1 = #{circunurseId1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
anesthetistId = #{anesthetistId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
circuAnesthetistId = #{circuAnesthetistId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
perfusionDoctorId = #{perfusionDoctorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
startTime = #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
instrnurseId2 = #{instrnurseId2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
circunurseId2 = #{circunurseId2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isHold = #{isHold,jdbcType=INTEGER},
healthNurse = #{healthNurse,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
optBody = #{optBody,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operRegDate = #{operRegDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pcs = #{pcs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
beid = #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where regOptId = #{regOptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update bas_dispatch set operRoomId = #{operRoomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operRoomName = #{operRoomName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, instrnurseId1 = #{instrnurseId1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, circunurseId1 = #{circunurseId1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, anesthetistId = #{anesthetistId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, circuAnesthetistId = #{circuAnesthetistId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, perfusionDoctorId = #{perfusionDoctorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, startTime = #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, instrnurseId2 = #{instrnurseId2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, circunurseId2 = #{circunurseId2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isHold = #{isHold,jdbcType=INTEGER}, healthNurse = #{healthNurse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, optBody = #{optBody,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operRegDate = #{operRegDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pcs = #{pcs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, beid = #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where regOptId = #{regOptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT m.name as operRoomName, o.sex,o.age,a.`startTime`,o.`hid`, (SELECT NAME FROM bas_user t WHERE t.beid = #{beid} AND t.`userName` = a.`circunurseId1`) circunurseName , (SELECT NAME FROM bas_user t WHERE t.beid = #{beid} AND t.`userName` = a.`instrnurseId1`) instrnurseName , a.pcs as seq,o.deptName,o.name,o.designedOptName as realoperationName,o.designedAnaesMethodName, (select name from bas_user where bas_user.userName = a.anesthetistId and bas_user.beid = #{beid})anesthetist_name, SUBSTRING(o.operatorName,LOCATE(',',o.operatorName)+1) operator_sec_name, CONCAT_WS(',',(select name from bas_user where bas_user.userName = a.circunurseId1 and bas_user.beid = #{beid}),(select name from bas_user where bas_user.userName = a.circunurseId2 and bas_user.beid = #{beid})) circunurse_name FROM bas_dispatch a left join bas_reg_opt o on a.regOptId = o.regOptId left join bas_operroom m on a.operRoomId = m.operRoomId and a.beid = m.beid where 1 = 1 and o.state in ('03','04','05') and o.operaDate = CURDATE() order by CONVERT(a.operRoomId,SIGNED),a.startTime asc

SELECT o.deptName,o.bed,o.hid,IF(CHAR_LENGTH(o.name)>2,CONCAT(SUBSTRING(o.name,1,1),'*',SUBSTRING(o.name,CHAR_LENGTH(o.name),1)),CONCAT(SUBSTRING(o.name,1,1),'*')) as name, o.sex,(select codeName from bas_sys_dict_item where groupId = 'operation_state' and codeValue = o.state and beid = #{beid}) as state,
(select codeName from bas_sys_dict_item where groupId = if((select leaveto from doc_anaes_pacu_rec where regOptId = o.regOptId)>0,'pacu_leave_to','leave_to') and codeValue = IFNULL((select leaveto from doc_anaes_pacu_rec where regOptId = o.regOptId), (select leaveTo from doc_anaes_record where regOptId = o.regOptId and o.state=state)) and beid = #{beid}) leaveTo
FROM bas_dispatch a left join bas_reg_opt o on a.regOptId = o.regOptId left join bas_operroom m on a.operRoomId = m.operRoomId and a.beid = m.beid where 1 = 1 and o.state in ('03','04','05','06','07') and o.operaDate = CURDATE() order by o.deptId,o.name,o.sex asc

select x.time,x.startTime from ( select 0 as time,'00:00' as startTime from dual union select 1 as time,'01:00' as startTime from dual union select 2 as time,'02:00' as startTime from dual union select 3 as time,'03:00' as startTime from dual union select 4 as time,'04:00' as startTime from dual union select 5 as time,'05:00' as startTime from dual union select 6 as time,'06:00' as startTime from dual union select 7 as time,'07:00' as startTime from dual union select 8 as time,'08:00' as startTime from dual union select 9 as time,'09:00' as startTime from dual union select 10 as time,'10:00' as startTime from dual union select 11 as time,'11:00' as startTime from dual union select 12 as time,'12:00' as startTime from dual union select 13 as time,'13:00' as startTime from dual union select 14 as time,'14:00' as startTime from dual union select 15 as time,'15:00' as startTime from dual union select 16 as time,'16:00' as startTime from dual union select 17 as time,'17:00' as startTime from dual union select 18 as time,'18:00' as startTime from dual union select 19 as time,'19:00' as startTime from dual union select 20 as time,'20:00' as startTime from dual union select 21 as time,'21:00' as startTime from dual union select 22 as time,'22:00' as startTime from dual union select 23 as time,'23:00' as startTime from dual ) x where x.time not in ( select startTime from bas_dispatch,bas_reg_opt where bas_dispatch.regOptId=bas_reg_opt.regOptId and bas_reg_opt.operaDate=#{operaDate} and bas_dispatch.operRoomId=#{operRoomId} and bas_reg_opt.state in ('02','03','04') and bas_reg_opt.beid = #{beid} )
UNION SELECT startTime AS TIME , IF(startTime < 10 , CONCAT('0',startTime,':00'),CONCAT(startTime,':00')) startTime FROM bas_dispatch WHERE regOptId = #{regOptId}
SELECT * FROM bas_dispatch a WHERE a.regOptId = #{regOptId}

SELECT c.*,(select bsc.codeName from bas_sys_dict_item bsc where bsc.groupId='opt_body' and bsc.codeValue=c.optBody and bsc.beid = #{beid}) as 'optBodyName',u1.name as "instrnurseName1",u3.name as "instrnurseName2",u2.name as "circunurseName1",u4.name as "circunurseName2",b.name as "anesthetistName", u5.name as "circuanesthetistName",u6.name as "perfusiondoctorName",u7.name as "healthnurseName" FROM bas_dispatch c left join bas_user b on c.anesthetistId = b.userName left join bas_user u1 on c.instrnurseId1 = u1.userName left join bas_user u2 on c.circunurseId1 = u2.userName left join bas_user u3 on c.instrnurseId2 = u3.userName left join bas_user u4 on c.circunurseId2 = u4.userName left join bas_user u5 on c.circuanesthetistId = u5.userName left join bas_user u6 on c.perfusionDoctorId = u6.userName left join bas_user u7 on c.healthnurse = u7.userName WHERE c.regOptId = #{regOptId} LIMIT 1

select d.operRoomId,ro.operaDate from bas_dispatch d left join bas_reg_opt ro on d.regOptId = ro.regOptId where d.operRoomId is not null and d.beid = ro.beid and d.beid = #{beid} and ro.operaDate = #{operaDate} GROUP BY d.operRoomId
select count(*) from bas_dispatch d left join bas_reg_opt r on d.regOptId = r.regOptId where r.operaDate = #{operaDate} and d.operRoomId = #{operRoomId} and d.startTime = #{startTime}
select count(*) from bas_dispatch where regOptId = #{regOptId}

SELECT o.regOptId,(select sc.codeName from bas_sys_dict_item sc where sc.groupId='operat_category' and beid = #{baseQuery.beid} and sc.codeValue=o.emergency) as emergencyName,o.`name`,o.sex,o.age,o.ageMon,o.ageDay,o.hid,o.regionName,o.isLocalAnaes, o.deptName,o.bed,o.diagnosisName,o.designedOptName,o.designedAnaesMethodName, o.operatorName,o.assistantName,o.operaDate,IFNULL(a.startTime,o.startTime) startTime,a.operRoomId,m.`name` as operRoomName, a.pcs,(select codeName from bas_sys_dict_item where groupId = 'pac_type' and codeValue = a.pcs and beid = #{baseQuery.beid}) as pcsName, a.instrnurseId1,a.instrnurseId2,a.circunurseId1,a.circunurseId2,a.optBody,o.remark,hypersusceptibility,medicalType, a.anesthetistId,(select name from bas_user where bas_user.username = a.anesthetistId and beid = #{baseQuery.beid}) anesthetistName, a.circuanesthetistId,(select name from bas_user where bas_user.username = a.circuanesthetistId and beid = #{baseQuery.beid}) circuAnesthetistName, a.perfusiondoctorId, o.optLevel,CASE o.cutLevel WHEN 1 THEN 'Ⅰ' WHEN 2 THEN 'Ⅱ' WHEN 3 THEN 'Ⅲ' WHEN 4 THEN 'Ⅳ' ELSE null END cutLevel FROM bas_dispatch a LEFT JOIN bas_reg_opt o ON a.`regOptId` = o.`regOptId` LEFT JOIN bas_operroom m ON a.operRoomId = m.operRoomId AND a.beid = m.beid WHERE 1 = 1 and a.beid = #{baseQuery.beid} AND o.state ='02'
and ((a.operRoomId is null) or (a.startTime is null) or (o.operaDate is null))
and a.operRoomId is not null and a.startTime is not null and o.operaDate is not null and (a.circunurseId1 is null or a.circunurseId1='')
and a.operRoomId is not null and a.startTime is not null and o.operaDate is not null
and (a.isHold IS NULL OR a.isHold != 0)
AND DATE_FORMAT(o.operaDate,'%Y-%m-%d') = #{baseQuery.operDate}
AND o.`name` LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{baseQuery.name}),'%')
AND o.`hid` LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{baseQuery.hid}),'%')
ORDER BY o.deptId,o.operaDate desc,IFNULL(a.startTime,o.startTime) ASC
ORDER BY a.operRoomId,a.pcs
ORDER BY a.operRoomId,a.pcs
LIMIT #{baseQuery.pageNo},#{baseQuery.pageSize}
mapper.update: update bas_dispatch set operRoomId = null ,operRoomName = NULL,pcs = NULL, instrnurseId1 = NULL,circunurseId1 = NULL,instrnurseId2 = NULL,circunurseId2 = NULL, anesthetistId = NULL,circuAnesthetistId = NULL WHERE regOptId = #{regOptId}
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(MAX(pcs)+1,1) FROM bas_dispatch WHERE operRoomId = #{operRoomId} AND operRegDate = #{operRegDate} AND beid = #{beid}
